channel.title: projects on Ayrat's Braindump
channel.description: Recent content in projects on Ayrat's Braindump

item.title: Life Balance
item.description: I released a mobile game called “Life Balance” in 2019. The idea of the game is an infinite runner with multiple life bars. I released it both for Android and iOS. But it was taken down from the App Store because I stopped my dev subscription. In 2021 I ported the game to web: itch.io self-hosted The game also has a landing site .
